The Facebook page: Humans of Hindutva' shared screenshots of Aaj Tak's television screen, displaying bold text claiming that alcohol and weed can cure coronavirus.
Several social media users also posted p: s broadcast with the claim that the channel stated alcohol and marijuana can cure coronavirus infection.
Aaj Tak posted a 15: minute video on YouTube titled "Is the cure for coronavirus hidden in alcohol or weed?" where they fact-checked the claims associated with coronavirus and debunked them.
Aaj Tak referenced an article published: backed daily newspaper Saamana, which claimed that alcohol can cure coronavirus. However, Aaj Tak did not support this claim and only reported on it.
